name: ARENA BCGDC 2020 "ARENA"
description:
for 2 players only.  No single player.                          can use external keyboard  for a more spatially conscious experience. 

Two Gladiators will duke it out to collect money, the first to $50,000 wins.  The loser receives a (fur)-ocious punishment.  

Gladiator 1(Player 1):    WASD to move/ spacebar to hit

Gladiator2(PLayer 2):     Arrow Keys / Shift to hit

OR                                                                                                      

(with numlock off) 845(2)6 /  Shift to hit
